name: Top Balance
description:
In this simple mobile game, you're playing as guy balancing on balance board

When you don't touch the ground you're score in second is rising. And when you're fail, the game saves your best score as record

To tilt balance board to the left, touch the left part of the screen, and the right part to tilt balance board to the right

SolutionTop - Unity scripts, technical desing, logic

hhulen - sounds and music

fpaine - 3d modeling, texturing, lighting

mdaniell - UI desing, game desing, scripts

antoneo74 - sounds, moral support, motivation
